EmailTemplate.name: 2016Q3.Global.NUR.1739.Airscale.Email 9 - Top 3 pieces of collateral
EmailTemplate.subject: Don’t miss these 3 insights into Nokia AirScale
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Discover the many benefits of AirScale Radio Access AirScale Radio Access Ready your radio network for 5G There are many ways AirScale Radio Access <[[http://networks.nokia.com/portfolio/products/airscale-radio-access]]> changes how networks are built. So many in fact that we’ve created a variety of tools to help you find out more.
Innovate in an instant with new radio access and read the new AirScale E-Book for further insight. Download the E-Book <[[http://nokia.ly/AirScaleBook]]> AirScale Base Station video Watch our new video and get to know/get a quick overview of the base station that prepares your network for 5G and IoT. Watch the video The architecture for the future “Nokia AirScale represents an architectural approach that can carry operators into the future. Importantly, AirScale provides the foundation.”
- Ken Rehbehn, principal analyst at 451 Research Download Whitepaper © 2016 Nokia. Contact Us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Terms of Use <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/terms]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
